D

disconnect() - Method in class distedit.DistributedTextEditor
Disconnect sets the Editor to its disconnected state and asks if changes should be saved In disconnected state no TCP/IP connection is running menu items allow for listening and connecting TextEventHistory is replaced by a new empty one text fields are cleared changes in area1 are reproduced locally in area2
disconnect() - Method in class distedit.net.AbstractConnector
Disconnect by closing the AbstractConnector.socket
disconnect() - Method in interface distedit.net.Connector
Disconnect
disconnect() - Method in class distedit.net.ServerConnector
 
dispatch(MyTextEvent) - Method in class distedit.event.dispatch.DistributedDispatcher
Dispatch a MyTextEvent by sending it to a peer through the Connector
dispatch(MyTextEvent) - Method in class distedit.event.dispatch.LocalDispatcher
Dispatch an event by adding it to a local TextEventHistory
dispatch(MyTextEvent) - Method in interface distedit.event.dispatch.TextEventDispatcher
Dispatch a MyTextEvent
distedit - package distedit
Classes for running a distributed text editor
distedit.event - package distedit.event
Text event classes to represent the user editing a document
distedit.event.dispatch - package distedit.event.dispatch
Text event dispatchers for local or distributed text editors
distedit.event.history - package distedit.event.history
Classes for representing a different text event histories
distedit.net - package distedit.net
Classes for connecting and sending events to peer text editors via TCP/IP sockets
DistributedDispatcher - Class in distedit.event.dispatch
Dispatch text events to a peer via a Connector
DistributedDispatcher(Connector) - Constructor for class distedit.event.dispatch.DistributedDispatcher
Construct the distributed dispatcher with a Connector
DistributedTextEditor - Class in distedit
A text editor that is able to run locally or act as a server or a client and establish connections to other text editors.
DistributedTextEditor() - Constructor for class distedit.DistributedTextEditor
Instantiate and build the text editor.
DocumentEventCapturer - Class in distedit
This class captures and dispatches the text events of the given document on which it is put as a filter.
DocumentEventCapturer(TextEventDispatcher) - Constructor for class distedit.DocumentEventCapturer
Constructor for the DocumentEventCapturer.
